abstract: Elizabeth Warren has captured national Democratic base in her nascent campaign for Scott Brown's Senate seat in Massachusetts, but it remains to be seen whether her scrappy populist rhetoric will appeal beyond her party's liberal base and resonate with independent voters.
snippet: In the Massachusetts Senate race, Elizabeth Warren’s combativeness captivated the national Democratic base, but Republicans are already seeking to use it against her.
lead_paragraph: In the Massachusetts Senate race, Elizabeth Warren’s combativeness captivated the national Democratic base, but Republicans are already seeking to use it against her.

headline.main: Candidate’s Fighting Words Draw G.O.P.’s Fire
headline.print_headline: Candidate’s Fighting Words Draw G.O.P.’s Fire
headline.seo: Elizabeth Warren’s Fighting Words Draw Return Fire From G.O.P. Rivals
